recipesJson.name: 1,2,3 Caramba
recipesJson.author: VenSyBoy
recipesJson.description:
What happens when you mix some of the best in their kind? 
Tasty SNV Berry Juice!
 
I like my fruit mixes with Ws-23 so forget this part or adjust to your likings as well as the sweetener.
0.5% CAP super sweet is all you need but feel free to add more if you want to, it only will get more towards commercial e-juice.
